title: A Stitch in Crime
description: When the coveted title of Saint Lucy goes to outsider Liisa Pelonen, folks in the close-knit town of Red Jacket are riled, but no one anticipates violence, especially not temporary police chief Hatti Lehtinen. So it is a distinct shock when Liisa’s lifeless body turns up in the sauna of Arvo Maki’s funeral home the evening before the Christmas Festival.
author: Ann Yost
